I'm Abhijit Das a.k.a silverFoxA

I'm a passionate mobile application and web developer.

I have started my professional career as a graphics designer. I had no coding background, I just learnt all myself from the open resources out there in internet. Becoming a programmer was just a dream, it was a dream of contributing something to virtual reality, which I thought pretty intersting 4 years back and I still think there's so many things to explore.

I strive to be an enterprenuer, with only one goal in mind, which is to make one of the rights, "Right to Information" truely valid.

"You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future."
-Lt Steve Jobs

This is how I work

Study Project

More than 80% of the product's success lies in the problem statement. Hence I focus more on it to ensure User Acceptance.

Design

Design models brings sense to the idea and the study put spices to it, to make it interactive with better user experience.

Product Development

Development is completely simple, as all the details are made, clean code is the key point.

Success

Finally the product development comes to an end after handing over to the user and getting valid good response.
